features: 【Communication Hub on Your Wrist】Experience seamless communication with our smart watches for men. The built-in HD speaker enables easy phone connectivity via Bluetooth for calls, music, and social media notifications (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter). Vibrating reminders and quick access to 100 contacts keep you informed on the move, ensuring you never miss calls or messages during activities.

【Elevate Your Style with Personalization】Experience a unique visual and interactive journey with the 1.83" HD full-touch color screen of our Android fitness watch. Choose from 100+ free watch faces, personalize with family, pet, or selfie photos. Four brightness levels adapt to different lighting, ensuring you can read information easily, allowing you to truly unleash your style.

【Precision Tracking for Goal Achievement】The fitness tracker watch with is your perfect companion for achieving daily goals. Record your activities such as steps, calories burned, and distance traveled, and monitor your sleep patterns. The smartwatch and app offer detailed data and graphics, including auto-tracking for sleep quality analysis—deep sleep, light sleep, and wake-up times—empowering informed decisions for a healthier lifestyle.

【Smart Living, Effortlessly Controlled】Experience smarter living at your fingertips with practical features like customizable watch faces, alarm clocks, stopwatch, timer, music, and camera control. Maintain an active lifestyle with sedentary reminders. The 250mAh battery charges in 2 hours, offering 7 days of usage and a 20-day standby. Compatible with Android 5.0+, iOS 9.0+, our reloj inteligente para hombre enhances your daily routine with convenience.

【Dive into Versatile Fitness Modes with Robust Durability】Our men's smart watch offers an 20+ sports modes, including running, walking, cycling, football, yoga, and more, easily customizable through the watch and app. With IP68 waterproofing , our smart watch is designed to withstand various conditions, from washing hands or exercising in the rain. Achieve your fitness goals without worrying about the watch's durability, making it an ideal companion for an active lifestyle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Bluetooth Calling 2 Information Notification 3 Activity Tracker
Previous page Next page 1 DIY Watch Faces 2 3-7 Days Battery Life 3 IP68 Waterproof
Previous page Next page 1 What's in The Box 2 How to Connect Your Phone

How to connect the smart watch to your phone? Download the "GloryFit" APP in the app store, turn on the Bluetooth function of your phone,enter the "Glory Fit" APP device page, find and bind "T19F", In the audio BT connection dialog box that pops up, click [Pairing], You can connect successfully. Why can't your watch receive SMS and notifications? 1. Please ensure the permissions of App, messages, calls, etc. are allowed when you download the Gloryfit app for the first time. 2. Enable the app you need to receive notifications within the Gloryfit app. How to set time, weather and units? After our watch is connected to the "Gloryfit" APP on your phone, it will automatically synchronize your current phone's time and weather information. You can set the temperature display unit in the upper left corner of the APP homepage. How to make the watch battery life last longer? You can turn off the 24-hour automatic detection of blood oxygen and heart rate in the Gloryfit APP. You can also choose to turn it off when you do not use the call function. It allows the watch to be used longer. How to turn on and off 24-hour heart rate detection? Open the "Gloryfit" APP, on the device page, click on the heart rate setting page to turn off or on automatic detection and detection frequency adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable watch for a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: It looks simple and stylish, but it is loaded and packed with features. So many useful aspects in this watch that make my daily life easier from fitness tracker, alarm clock, sleep monitor, controlling music, answering calls/texts, etc. I am extremely satisfied with the overall functionality and performance of this watch. It has a solid build quality and holds up well in my day to day life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Smartwatch & Excellence for Fitness and Style
reviews.reviewText: Impressed with this smartwatch! Close accurate heart rate & sleep monitoring, waterproof, stylish design, and seamless notifications. Great value! 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooler than I thought!!
reviews.reviewText: So, when purchasing this watch, my husband and I were hoping it would help us track our daily steps and monitor our health with the click of a button. What we didn't know was that we could choose our own watch face design (there are so many options to choose from!) , and we can also make/receive calls and have phone conversations with the watch! How great is that!!! My husband and I love this watch! It's fantastic! It syncs with Google Fit and also with other health tracking apps. It's also very easy to use! All in all, I give it 5 stars and it seems to be fairly accurate as far as pedometers go. It also monitors sleep. The only thing I wish about this watch is that the bands could be replaced. Other than that, definitely worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Fitness Tracker for the Modern Man
reviews.reviewText: This fitness tracker is a great option for people who want a smartwatch that can do it all. It has a stylish design, a variety of features, and is surprisingly affordable.Pros:Stylish design: The 1.83-inch HD full-touch color screen is bright and easy to read, and there are over 100 watch faces to choose from. You can even personalize your watch face with a photo of your family, pet, or selfie.Variety of features: This fitness tracker can track your steps, calories burned, distance traveled, sleep patterns, and more. It also has built-in GPS, so you can track your runs and walks without having to carry your phone.Long battery life: The battery lasts for up to 7 days on a single charge, so you don't have to worry about constantly recharging it.Affordable: This fitness tracker is very affordable, especially considering all the features it has.Cons:Not as accurate as some other trackers: This fitness tracker is not as accurate as some of the more expensive trackers on the market. However, it is still accurate enough for most people's needs.Can be bulky: This fitness tracker is a bit bulky and may not be comfortable for everyone to wear.Overall:This fitness tracker is a great option for men who want a stylish and affordable smartwatch that can track their fitness and health. It has a variety of features that make it a great value for the price.Here are some additional thoughts:I was impressed with the quality of the display. It is bright and easy to read, even in direct sunlight.The battery life is excellent. I was able to get up to 7 days of use on a single charge.The variety of watch faces is a great feature. I was able to find a watch face that I really liked.The fitness tracking features are accurate enough for most people's needs.The built-in GPS is a great feature for runners and walkers.The affordability of this fitness tracker makes it a great option for budget-minded buyers.I would recommend this fitness tracker to anyone looking for a stylish and affordable smartwatch that can track their fitness and health.I hope this review is helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value smartwatch
reviews.reviewText: A good device, convenient, and functional well. Battery life is great, I have only charged it once in last a few days. Charging is fast. Good looking and stylish. Great gift, may get another one if it comes in other colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It has a mind of its own
reviews.reviewText: It has a lot of features, O2, BP, Sleep...the battery life is horrible, only lasts one day.....the Bluetooth goes in & out, interfering with other Bluetooth connections....Answers the calls & texts from the phone when it wants to. Like I said, it has a mind of its own.....It does keep time & would be a great WATCH if the battery would last longer than one day.I wish I could return it but I threw away the box & paperwork.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unmatched price paired with exceptional quality.
reviews.reviewText: There are numerous appealing aspects: the appearance, comfort, functionality, and battery life. While I won't detail all the features/functions, notable highlights include vibration alerts, alarms, timers, answering calls, viewing messages, and controlling music. I appreciate the convenience of receiving alerts and answering calls via Bluetooth even when I'm some distance from my phone. I highly recommend this for first-time users to test its utility in daily life. It has proven quite useful in mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch at affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I love this smartwatch due to the fact that I don't have to pick up my phone anymore to receive text messages or answer phone calls from my lovely wife. It functions very well in the water while swimming and any other physical endurance activity you might encounter. My favorite apps are the reminder notifications for sitting too long, drink water, alarm clock, and every other app. I guess I like them all. The battery last for days literally days. Don't pass up this deal it's a very competitive price compared to other brands.
